description: Schema describing a fact-check of a claim

title.description: A very short title for the claim made

description.description: A description of the claim made. Keep the description without fluff like a news sub-headline.

truthfulnessScore.description: A truthfulness score between 1-5. The score should represent 1 - Untrue, 2-Mostly Untrue 3-Mix of Truth 4-Mostly True 5-True

response.description: A medium-length response summarizing why the claim is true or untrue
